column2: The USA send us Commodore Perry.

The Perry Expedition, or as it's known in Japan the "Arrival of the Black Ships" was a diplomatic and military expedition to the Tokugawa Shogunate, involving two separate voyages by warships of the United States Navy, which took place during 1853 to 54. The goals of this expedition included exploration, surveying, and the establishment of diplomatic relations and negotiation of trade agreements with various nations of the region.
